title: S3 Ep23: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 13 – Hot Tips
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 13 – Hot Tips
description:
October 25, 2018 / Jon Cryer hosts this week's addendum and is joined by Colin Miller and Susan Simpson, and guest panelist, Ed Costikyan, previous intern at GIP, discuss the Dennis Perry case.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Squarespace, Blue Apron, Scentbird, and Robinhood.
